ayahs.indonesian: Celakalah bagi setiap pengumpat dan pencela,
ayahs.english: Woe to every scorner and mocker
Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

ayahs.indonesian: dia (manusia) mengira bahwa hartanya itu dapat mengekalkannya,
ayahs.english: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

ayahs.indonesian: Sekali-kali tidak! Pasti dia akan dilemparkan ke dalam (neraka) Hutamah.
ayahs.english: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan tahukah kamu apa (neraka) Hutamah itu?
ayahs.english: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
Which mounts directed at the hearts.

ayahs.indonesian: Sungguh, api itu ditutup rapat atas (diri) mereka,
ayahs.english: Indeed, it [i.e., Hellfire] will be closed down upon them

ayahs.indonesian: (sedang mereka itu) diikat pada tiang-tiang yang panjang.
